meanings.definition: To stay longer than intended or expected.
meanings.sent1: She outstayed her welcome at the party by talking too much.
meanings.sent2: He outstayed his visit at the museum to see all the exhibits.
meanings.sent3: The cat outstayed its nap time and woke up hungry.
meanings.sent4: The marathon runner outstayed his competitors and won the race.
meanings.sent5: The student outstayed the library hours to finish studying for the exam.

meanings.definition: To remain in a place beyond the usual or expected time.
meanings.sent1: They outstayed their reservation at the restaurant by chatting after dinner.
meanings.sent2: The hiker outstayed the campsite to enjoy the beautiful sunset.
meanings.sent3: The dog outstayed its stay at the park and made new friends.
meanings.sent4: The flower outstayed its bloom and wilted in the summer heat.
meanings.sent5: The traveler outstayed the hotel checkout time and had to pay extra.
